title: Assignments
content:
The homeworks refer to reading assignments and select problems from the course textbook:
Kassakian, John G., Martin F. Schlecht, and George C. Verghese. Principles of Power Electronics. Reading, MA: Addison-Wesley, 1991. ISBN: 9780201096897. (abbreviated as KSV).
